verses.english: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

strongs_def: properly, instrumental music; by implication, a poem set to notes
gloss: psalm.

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)
gloss: certain(-ty), confirm, direct, faithfulness, fashion, fasten, firm, be fitted, be fixed, frame, be meet, ordain, order, perfect, (make) preparation, prepare (self), provide, make provision, (be, make) ready, right, set (aright, fast, forth), be stable, (e-) stablish, stand, tarry, [idiom] very deed.

strongs_def: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
gloss: [phrase] care for, comfortably, consent, [idiom] considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), [idiom] heed, [idiom] I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), [idiom] regard(-ed), [idiom] themselves, [idiom] unawares, understanding, [idiom] well, willingly, wisdom.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: or (the original form) שׁוּר; (1 Samuel 18:6), a primitive root (rather identical with H7788 (שׁוּר) through the idea of strolling minstrelsy);
strongs_def: to sing
gloss: behold (by mistake for H7789 (שׁוּר)), sing(-er, -ing man, -ing woman).

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

strongs_def: meaning accession (used as an adverb or conjunction); also or yea; adversatively though
gloss: also, [phrase] although, and (furthermore, yet), but, even, [phrase] how much less (more, rather than), moreover, with, yea.

strongs_def: properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
gloss: glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).

verses.english: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with through the idea of opening the eyes);
strongs_def: to wake (literally or figuratively)
gloss: (a-) wake(-n, up), lift up (self), [idiom] master, raise (up), stir up (self).

strongs_def: a skin-bag for liquids (from collapsing when empty); hence, a vase (as similar in shape when full); also a lyre (as having a body of like form)
gloss: bottle, pitcher, psaltery, vessel, viol.

derivation: from a unused root meaning to twang;
strongs_def: a harp
gloss: harp.

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with through the idea of opening the eyes);
strongs_def: to wake (literally or figuratively)
gloss: (a-) wake(-n, up), lift up (self), [idiom] master, raise (up), stir up (self).

strongs_def: dawn (literal, figurative or adverbial)
gloss: day(-spring), early, light, morning, whence riseth.

verses.english: I will praise thee, O LORD, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

strongs_def: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
gloss: folk, men, nation, people.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

strongs_def: properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
gloss: lest, neither, no, none (that...), not (any), nothing.

derivation: or לְאוֹם; from an unused root meaning to gather;
strongs_def: a community
gloss: nation, people.

verses.english: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
gloss: [phrase] aloud, elder(-est), [phrase] exceeding(-ly), [phrase] far, (man of) great (man, matter, thing,-er,-ness), high, long, loud, mighty, more, much, noble, proud thing, [idiom] sore, ([idiom]) very.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
gloss: favour, good deed(-liness, -ness), kindly, (loving-) kindness, merciful (kindness), mercy, pity, reproach, wicked thing.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

strongs_def: a powder (as beaten small); by analogy, a thin vapor; by extension, the firmament
gloss: cloud, small dust, heaven, sky.

strongs_def: stability; (figuratively) certainty, truth, trustworthiness
gloss: assured(-ly), establishment, faithful, right, sure, true (-ly, -th), verity.

verses.english: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;

strongs_def: to be high actively, to rise or raise (in various applications, literally or figuratively)
gloss: bring up, exalt (self), extol, give, go up, haughty, heave (up), (be, lift up on, make on, set up on, too) high(-er, one), hold up, levy, lift(-er) up, (be) lofty, ([idiom] a-) loud, mount up, offer (up), [phrase] presumptuously, (be) promote(-ion), proud, set up, tall(-er), take (away, off, up), breed worms.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
gloss: glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).

verses.english: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.

strongs_def: properly, heed, i.e. purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically, in order that
gloss: because of, to the end (intent) that, for (to,... 's sake), [phrase] lest, that, to.

strongs_def: to pull off; hence (intensively) to strip, (reflex.) to depart; by implication, to deliver, equip (for fight); present, strengthen
gloss: arm (self), (go, ready) armed ([idiom] man, soldier), deliver, draw out, make fat, loose, (ready) prepared, put off, take away, withdraw self.

strongs_def: loved
gloss: amiable, (well-) beloved, loves.

strongs_def: properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor
gloss: [idiom] at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.

strongs_def: the right hand or side (leg, eye) of a person or other object (as the stronger and more dexterous); locally, the south
gloss: [phrase] left-handed, right (hand, side), south.

strongs_def: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
gloss: give account, afflict (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), (cause to, give) answer, bring low (by mistake for H6031 (עָנָה)), cry, hear, Leannoth, lift up, say, [idiom] scholar, (give a) shout, sing (together by course), speak, testify, utter, (bear) witness. See also H1042 (בֵּית עֲנוֹת), H1043 (בֵּית עֲנָת).

verses.english: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
gloss: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

strongs_def: to jump for joy, i.e. exult
gloss: be joyful, rejoice, triumph.

strongs_def: to be smooth (figuratively); by implication (as smooth stones were used for lots) to apportion or separate
gloss: deal, distribute, divide, flatter, give, (have, im-) part(-ner), take away a portion, receive, separate self, (be) smooth(-er).

strongs_def: Shekem, a place in Palestine
gloss: Shechem.

strongs_def: a vale (i.e. broad depression)
gloss: dale, vale, valley (often used as a part of proper names). See also H1025 (בֵּית הָעֵמֶק).

derivation: or סֻכֹּת; plural of H5521 (סֻכָּה); booths;
strongs_def: Succoth, the name of a place in Egypt and of three in Palestine
gloss: Succoth.

strongs_def: properly, to stretch; by implication, to measure (as if by stretching a line); figuratively, to be extended
gloss: measure, mete, stretch self.

verses.english: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;

strongs_def: Gilad, a region East of the Jordan; also the name of three Israelites
gloss: Gilead, Gileadite.

strongs_def: Menashsheh, a grandson of Jacob, also the tribe descended from him, and its territory
gloss: Manasseh.

derivation: dual of masculine form of H672 (אֶפְרָת); double fruit;
strongs_def: Ephrajim, a son of Joseph; also the tribe descended from him, and its territory
gloss: Ephraim, Ephraimites.

derivation: (also מָעוּז ); or מָעֹז (also מָעֻז; from H5810 (עָזַז);
strongs_def: a fortified place; figuratively, a defence
gloss: force, fort(-ress), rock, strength(-en), ([idiom] most) strong (hold).

derivation: from an unused root apparently meaning to shake;
strongs_def: the head (as most easily shaken), whether literal or figurative (in many applications, of place, time, rank, itc.)
gloss: band, beginning, captain, chapiter, chief(-est place, man, things), company, end, [idiom] every (man), excellent, first, forefront, (be-)head, height, (on) high(-est part, (priest)), [idiom] lead, [idiom] poor, principal, ruler, sum, top.

strongs_def: Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory
gloss: Judah.

strongs_def: properly, to hack, i.e. engrave (Judges 5:14, to be a scribe simply); by implication, to enact (laws being cut in stone or metal tablets in primitive times) or (gen.) prescribe
gloss: appoint, decree, governor, grave, lawgiver, note, pourtray, print, set.

verses.english: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.

derivation: from a prolonged form of the prepositional prefix m-and H1 (אָב); from (her (the mother's)) father;
strongs_def: Moab, an incestuous son of Lot; also his territory and descendants
gloss: Moab.

derivation: or (feminine) סִירָה; or סִרָה; (Jeremiah 52:18), from a primitive root meaning to boil up;
strongs_def: a pot; also a thorn (as springing up rapidly); by implication, a hook
gloss: caldron, fishhook, pan, (wash-)pot, thorn.

strongs_def: a bath
gloss: wash(-pot).

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: or (fully) אֱדוֹם ; from H122 (אָדֹם); red (see Genesis 25:25);
strongs_def: Edom, the elder twin-brother of Jacob; hence the region (Idumaea) occupied by him
gloss: Edom, Edomites, Idumea.

strongs_def: to throw out, down or away (literally or figuratively)
gloss: adventure, cast (away, down, forth, off, out), hurl, pluck, throw.

strongs_def: properly, a sandal tongue; by extension a sandal or slipper (sometimes as a symbol of occupancy, a refusal to marry, or of something valueless)
gloss: dryshod, (pair of) shoe((-latchet), -s).

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: Pelesheth, a region of Syria
gloss: Palestina, Palestine, Philistia, Philistines.

strongs_def: to mar (especially by breaking); figuratively, to split the ears (with sound), i.e. shout (for alarm or joy)
gloss: blow an alarm, cry (alarm, aloud, out), destroy, make a joyful noise, smart, shout (for joy), sound an alarm, triumph.

verses.english: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

derivation: an interrogative pronoun of persons, as H4100 (מָה) is of things,
strongs_def: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
gloss: any (man), [idiom] he, [idiom] him, [phrase] O that! what, which, who(-m, -se, -soever), [phrase] would to God.

strongs_def: properly, to flow; causatively, to bring (especially with pomp)
gloss: bring (forth), carry, lead (forth).

derivation: or (in the plural) עָר; or עָיַר; (Judges 10:4), from H5782 (עוּר)
strongs_def: a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)
gloss: Ai (from margin), city, court (from margin), town.

derivation: also (in plural) feminine (Daniel 11:l5) מִבְצָרָה; from H1219 (בָּצַר);
strongs_def: a fortification, castle, or fortified city; figuratively, a defender
gloss: (de-, most) fenced, fortress, (most) strong (hold).

derivation: an interrogative pronoun of persons, as H4100 (מָה) is of things,
strongs_def: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
gloss: any (man), [idiom] he, [idiom] him, [phrase] O that! what, which, who(-m, -se, -soever), [phrase] would to God.

strongs_def: to guide; by implication, to transport (into exile, or as colonists)
gloss: bestow, bring, govern, guide, lead (forth), put, straiten.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

derivation: or (fully) אֱדוֹם ; from H122 (אָדֹם); red (see Genesis 25:25);
strongs_def: Edom, the elder twin-brother of Jacob; hence the region (Idumaea) occupied by him
gloss: Edom, Edomites, Idumea.

verses.english: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: a primitive root meaning to push aside, i.e.
strongs_def: reject, forsake, fail
gloss: cast away (off), remove far away (off).

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.
gloss: [idiom] after, appear, [idiom] assuredly, bear out, [idiom] begotten, break out, bring forth (out, up), carry out, come (abroad, out, thereat, without), [phrase] be condemned, depart(-ing, -ure), draw forth, in the end, escape, exact, fail, fall (out), fetch forth (out), get away (forth, hence, out), (able to, cause to, let) go abroad (forth, on, out), going out, grow, have forth (out), issue out, lay (lie) out, lead out, pluck out, proceed, pull out, put away, be risen, [idiom] scarce, send with commandment, shoot forth, spread, spring out, stand out, [idiom] still, [idiom] surely, take forth (out), at any time, [idiom] to (and fro), utter.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: a mass of persons (or figuratively, things), especially reg. organized forwar (an army); by implication, a campaign, literally or figuratively (specifically, hardship, worship)
gloss: appointed time, ([phrase]) army, ([phrase]) battle, company, host, service, soldiers, waiting upon, war(-fare).

verses.english: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.

strongs_def: to give (whether literal or figurative); generally, to put; imperatively (reflexive) come
gloss: ascribe, bring, come on, give, go, set, take.

derivation: or עֶזְרָת; (Psalm 60:11 (13); Psalm 108:12 (13)), feminine of H5828 (עֵזֶר);
strongs_def: aid
gloss: help(-ed, -er).

derivation: or צָר; from H6887 (צָרַר); compare as in H6864 (צֹר)
strongs_def: narrow; (as a noun) a tight place (usually figuratively, i.e. trouble); also a pebble ; (transitive) an opponent (as crowding)
gloss: adversary, afflicted(-tion), anguish, close, distress, enemy, flint, foe, narrow, small, sorrow, strait, tribulation, trouble.

derivation: or שַׁו; from the same as H7722 (שׁוֹא) in the sense of desolating;
strongs_def: evil (as destructive), literally (ruin) or morally (especially guile); figuratively idolatry (as false, subjective), uselessness (as deceptive, objective; also adverbially, in vain)
gloss: false(-ly), lie, lying, vain, vanity.

derivation: or תְּשֻׁעָה; from H7768 (שָׁוַע) in the sense of H3467 (יָשַׁע);
strongs_def: rescue (literal or figurative, persons, national or spiritual)
gloss: deliverance, help, safety, salvation, victory.

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

verses.english: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application
gloss: accomplish, advance, appoint, apt, be at, become, bear, bestow, bring forth, bruise, be busy, [idiom] certainly, have the charge of, commit, deal (with), deck, [phrase] displease, do, (ready) dress(-ed), (put in) execute(-ion), exercise, fashion, [phrase] feast, (fight-) ing man, [phrase] finish, fit, fly, follow, fulfill, furnish, gather, get, go about, govern, grant, great, [phrase] hinder, hold (a feast), [idiom] indeed, [phrase] be industrious, [phrase] journey, keep, labour, maintain, make, be meet, observe, be occupied, offer, [phrase] officer, pare, bring (come) to pass, perform, pracise, prepare, procure, provide, put, requite, [idiom] sacrifice, serve, set, shew, [idiom] sin, spend, [idiom] surely, take, [idiom] thoroughly, trim, [idiom] very, [phrase] vex, be (warr-) ior, work(-man), yield, use.

strongs_def: probably a force, whether of men, means or other resources; an army, wealth, virtue, valor, strength
gloss: able, activity, ([phrase]) army, band of men (soldiers), company, (great) forces, goods, host, might, power, riches, strength, strong, substance, train, ([phrase]) valiant(-ly), valour, virtuous(-ly), war, worthy(-ily).

derivation: of which the feminine (beyond the Pentateuch) is הִיא; a primitive word, the third person pronoun singular;
strongs_def: he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
gloss: he, as for her, him(-self), it, the same, she (herself), such, that (...it), these, they, this, those, which (is), who.

strongs_def: to trample (literally or figuratively)
gloss: loath, tread (down, under (foot)), be polluted.

derivation: or צָר; from H6887 (צָרַר); compare as in H6864 (צֹר)
strongs_def: narrow; (as a noun) a tight place (usually figuratively, i.e. trouble); also a pebble ; (transitive) an opponent (as crowding)
gloss: adversary, afflicted(-tion), anguish, close, distress, enemy, flint, foe, narrow, small, sorrow, strait, tribulation, trouble.
